ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:17:34 [Issue ID 4000-131724] urn:comicvine:4000-131724 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 09:00:01. [Issue ID 241292]
ComicInfo.Summary: Hunter Blackthorne, an old enemy of the Nobles, is released from prison and reunited with his criminal family. He blames Race for the death of his son Pierce and plots to kill Liz in retaliation. Meanwhile, Celeste is revealed to be the secret lover of Dawn Blackthorne.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Fran Bueno,Freddie E. Williams II,Gabe Bridwell
ComicInfo.Inker: Fran Bueno,Freddie E. Williams II,Gabe Bridwell
